1.0.name: wordpress/sports-news-rss-plugin
1.0.description:
Adds a customizable widget which displays the latest sports related news from all over the world. It can be integrated anywhere in the blog. This newsticker shows up the last five or more Sport related news posts from sone of the worlds most popular sports sites. This is a very nice solution for all those wanting to share breaking sports related news and for all the sports blogs out there.

If you have tech related questions/support etc, though I don't see why you would (check the read me file included for help), it's really a basic plugin, shoot me a msg on my GuyRo blog @ guyro.com in the comments and i'll do my best to get back to you.

Feature List

  • customizable widget
  • displays a user-defined number of links
  • title shortening
